member.name: _MF_CROSS_ORIGIN_POLICY
member.summary: Maps to the W3C cross origin settings (CORS) attribute used by the HTML5 media element

member.name: _MF_CROSS_ORIGIN_POLICY.MF_CROSS_ORIGIN_POLICY_ANONYMOUS
member.summary: Requests for the element will have their mode set to "cors" and their credentials mode set to "same-origin".

member.name: _MF_CROSS_ORIGIN_POLICY.MF_CROSS_ORIGIN_POLICY_USE_CREDENTIALS
member.summary: Requests for the element will have their mode set to "cors" and their credentials mode set to "include".
